Module Assignment
Package models

Class Suggestion

java.lang.Object
models.Suggestion
public class Suggestion extends Object
A class that contains the model of a Suggestion made for a camp.

    • Suggestion

      public Suggestion(int suggestionID, String campName, String senderID, String suggestionMessage)
      Constructs a suggestion with the provided details.
      Parameters:
      suggestionID - The unique identifier (ID) for the suggestion.
      campName - The name of the camp associated with the suggestion.
      senderID - The identifier of the sender of the suggestion.
      suggestionMessage - The string content of the suggestion message.
